description: Add a sequential thought with its metadata. This tool processes individual thinking steps in a structured sequence, allowing for detailed analysis and tracking of the reasoning process.

thought.description: The content of the thought or reasoning step

thought_number.description: The sequence number of this thought in the overall thinking process

total_thoughts.description: The total expected number of thoughts in the complete sequence

next_thought_needed.description: Whether more thoughts are needed after this one to complete the reasoning process

stage.description: The thinking stage (Problem Definition, Research, Analysis, Synthesis, Conclusion)

tags.description: Optional keywords or categories for organizing and categorizing the thought

axioms_used.description: Optional list of principles, rules, or axioms used in this thought step

assumptions_challenged.description: Optional list of assumptions that are challenged or questioned by this thought
